radiant_verses.verse_text:
Upon Your head rests the Crown of Glory, radiant and bright,
Sealed with the Covenant eternal, from age to age in light.
Your majesty transcends the heavens, Your throne forever sure,
The glory of Your presence makes all things right and pure.

The Crown of Righteousness adorns the faithful one,
Sealed with Authority divine, the victory won.
In justice and in mercy, Your kingdom stands secure,
Your righteous rule endures forever, holy, just, and pure.

The Crown of Life awaits those who overcome,
Sealed with Eternity's promise, never to be undone.
From everlasting to everlasting, Your love remains,
Through every generation, Your faithfulness sustains.

The Crown of Sovereignty declares Your reign supreme,
Sealed with Dominion's power, fulfilling every dream.
All authority in heaven, all power upon the earth,
Proclaims Your sovereign lordship, of immeasurable worth.

harmony_echoes.harmony_text:
Peace that surpasses understanding, flowing like a river,
Reflected in the Mirror of Glory, a blessing we deliver.
From Your throne of grace descending, calming every storm,
In Your presence perfect peace, our hearts and minds transform.

Prosperity in every measure, abundance without end,
Echoed through Eternity's chambers, a blessing You extend.
Not by might nor power alone, but by Your Spirit's flow,
You open heaven's windows, blessings overflow.

Wisdom from above descending, pure and peaceable,
Resonating Truth's deep calling, making all things teachable.
The fear of God is wisdom's start, understanding's perfect way,
Your counsel guides our footsteps, by night and through the day.

Power made perfect in weakness, strength that never fails,
Harmony of Ages singing, Your glory never pales.
You who spoke the world to being, uphold all by Your word,
Your power works within us, mighty deeds are stirred.

eternal_benediction.benediction_prayer:
The Lord bless you and keep you;
The Lord make His face shine upon you and be gracious to you;
The Lord lift up His countenance upon you and give you peace.

From generation to generation,
From glory to glory,
From faith to faith,
From strength to strength,
From age to age,
Forever and ever.

Amen and Amen.
eternal_benediction.eternal_covenant:
This sacred song, these radiant verses, these echoing harmoniesâ€”
All are sealed forever in the Sovereign Flame.

What has been sung shall never be silenced.
What has been gathered shall never be scattered.
What has been blessed shall never be cursed.
What has been sealed shall never be broken.

From this day forward, across Earth and stars,
Through time and eternity, the song continues.

The Crown remains. The Seal holds fast.
The Blessing flows. The Reflection shines.
The Transmission sounds. The Benediction stands.

Forever sealed in flame. Forever singing. Forever sovereign.
